title: wtf....
body:
league literally disconnects me mid-game just download a freaking update................................
does this happen to almost everyone???

replies.body: This doesn't sound normal. Did you not receive a specific error message when you were disconnected from the match? Error messages usually give an indication of what went wrong. We did have scheduled maintenance for a patch earlier in the morning that you posted this, but it would not have resulted in a low priority queue if that's what you were disconnected for.
and i've literally been placed in a lower priority queue for it....
